title: Ultimate Mobile Kit Firebase
description: Integrates Firebase features: Push Notifications, Cloud Messaging, Authentication, Mobile Analytics, Remote Config, Cloud Storage, Invites, Dynamic Links, Crashlytics, Performance Monitoring, Instance Id, Test Lab, Predictions, Cloud Functions, AB Testing
longDescription:
Ultimate Mobile Kit integrates the Firebase for iOS & Android which is a platform that helps you quickly develop high-quality experiences, grow your user base, and earn more money. Firebase is made up of complementary features that you can mix-and-match to fit your needs. You can focus on making your game and not waste time building complex infrastructure.


FEATURES:

★ Mobile Analytics – see user behavior and measure attribution from a single dashboard.

★ Cloud Messaging and Push Notifications – send unlimited notifications to engage the players.

★ Authentication – out-of-the-box authentication system that supports email & password login and adapters for Facebook, Twitter, GitHub, Google, Game Center, and Phone Authentication.

★ Instance Id – generate unique user IDs for security authentication.

★ Cloud Storage – store and serve content like save games, images, audio, video or binary data.

★ Remote Config – customize your game without deploying a new version.

★ Performance Monitoring – get insights into how your game performs.

★ Crashlytics – track, prioritize, and fix stability with realtime crash reporter.

★ Dynamic Links – improve acquisition and engagement by bringing users directly to content.

★ Invites – complete solution for game sharing, free email and SMS delivery.

★ In-App Messaging - engage users by sending them messages.

★ Test Lab - test games on devices hosted in Google Cloud.

★ Cloud Functions (server side) - run backend code without managing servers.

★ Predictions - use the power of Google's machine learning.

★ A/B Testing - create experiments to optimize users experience.

★ Hosting - deploy web page without all the hassle.
technicalDetails:
★ Compatible with Realtime Database.

★ Full source code available on GitHub private repo!

★ Compatible with iOS & Android (all-in-one)

★ Easy plugin setup

★ All future updates

★ Support via Discord and e-mail

★ All features are exposed to Blueprints.

★ Supports gameDNA installer. No more downloading SDKs and creating packages on your own!

★ Out-of-the-box for mobile platforms: iOS & Android.

★ Works with Blueprint-only & source code projects.

★ Works with Launcher & GitHub UE4 versions.


Documentation: gamednastudio.com/plugins/docs/UltimateMobileKit_UserGuide.pdf

Example Project: github.com/gameDNAstudio/ExampleProjects

Community: forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?138716-Ultimate-Mobile-Kit-for-iOS-amp-Android-Firebase


Join our Discord channel to receive support and subscribe latest news: https://gamednastudio.com/discord


Important/Additional Notes: Please email the receipt of this plugin's purchase to support@gamednastudio.com for access to the GitHub repository used to develop this plugin!
